text:
The number and size of board committees will depend on the size, complexity, and
nature of the business. Regulations often require that firms have audit committees.
Financial services firms are often required to have a risk committee as well. Some
companies combine two functions into one committee. The composition of a board
committee is often based on its function, with audit committees, compensation
committees, and governance committees often made up of only non-executive or
independent directors.
